sys_openapi_operation.name: Returns a list of all non-archived assets
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Returns a list of all non-archived assets","fOperationId":"getAllAssets","fDescription":"Returns a list of all non-archived assets. By default, only the id of each asset is included. This is customizable through query parameters. Only the 'name' field is currently supported. In order to retrieve other fields, use the API for querying the list of assets of a specific type instead.
